scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Betrayal of Christ, with Jesus at the center being embraced and apprehended by a group of soldiers and other figures. One figure, identified as Judas, is kissing Jesus, while others hold him and prepare to lead him away. A figure in the background raises a lantern, possibly to illuminate the scene. The setting is an outdoor landscape with rolling hills, trees, and a starry blue sky. In the foreground, a man is shown picking up a fallen sword or weapon, and discarded boots lie on the ground.
